result.reason: The request is high-impact and currently underspecified, especially around inheritance, tree behavior, and serialization when a connection can contain children.
result.approach: Request concrete expected behavior and edge-case rules first, then design a model update that allows child nodes on connection entries and update tree UI plus serializers/tests accordingly.
